data.title: Ten years of membership of the Republic of Croatia in the European Union
data.text:
It has been exactly ten years now since 1 July 2013, when Croatia became a full member of the European Union.

By joining the EU, which, according to Eurostat’s latest estimates, has a population of almost half a billion, Croatia has been given many opportunities for growth and development.

However, benefits are accompanied with new challenges and responsibilities, and in the text below you can find out how we coped with this large market for people, goods and services – 10 statistical domains for 10 Croatian years in the EU!
